Text.Page:
Eh? Did the Mysterium send you?

I'm Dodgson, and this place is called the Trial of Champion. Just past the big fence up ahead, you'll find a big golem. You'll need to kill that if you're trying to get to the wizard's room.

Just so you know, though, only 1 person can go past the fence, so make sure that whoever goes is very skilled.

Now, that said, someone else can go in, if they drink the Manxome Draught.

Anyone who doesn't go in can operate one of the siege weapons, and help out that way. Kill enough monsters with a siege weapon, and you'll unlock a special power!
